List Metric Names¶

Returns a list of all metric names.

Method¶

GET

Request¶

http://[host]:[port]/api/v1/metricnames

Body¶

None

Response¶

Success

Returns 200 for successful queries.

{
  "results": [
    "archive_file_search",
    "archive_file_tracked"
  ]
}
